summary:
This mod makes the transmute skill use 10 magicka instead of 100.

Iron ore transmutes directly into gold ore.

This mod also gives more Alteration experience per cast and takes 2.5 seconds less time to charge.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes the transmute skill use 10 magicka instead of 100.

Iron ore transmutes directly into gold ore.

This mod also gives more Alteration experience per cast and takes 2.5 seconds less time to charge.

Steam-friendly version here:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=115526663
author: Aderic
